resources.string: Progress towards your daily quota of app use, for the apps you selected, is visualised around the edge of the screen. \n\nAnd the more you use an app you\'re aiming to use less, the brighter this will get. When you stop using it, this will \'cool off\'.

Some devices run aggressive battery saving processes that may stop &appname; from working reliably or prevent it from running automatically. Please press the buttons below for some tips on how to disable such optimisations for &appname;, and to enable auto start if your device requires it. Thank you!
